name: 丁振卿
objective:
工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，傳統建廠模式無法確保建廠完工後能順利運作，工業4.0智能工廠建廠模式分成3D工廠規劃設計、虛擬智能工廠建模、虛擬智能工廠虛實整合、實體工廠建置四步驟，透過虛擬智能工廠與雲端資料庫資訊的虛實整合後，才能確保智能工廠建置完成後可以順利運作。
The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. The traditional factory building technique cannot be used in an intelligent factory. Building an industry 4.0 intelligent factory follows 4 steps: 3D planning and design of factory, modeling of virtual intelligent factory, integration of the actual situation for virtual intelligent factory, and build of the real factory. Integration of the virtual intelligent factory with cloud database information is required for working of the intelligent factory.
schedule:
1 智能工廠概述
2-4 雲端資料庫建置
5-8　　智能工廠雲端ERP及MES介紹
9 期中考
10-15 智能工廠建模
16-17 智能工廠虛實整合
18 期末考
scorePolicy: 上課表現20%、期中考40%、期末考40%。
materials: 凱文瑞克，PHP5與MySQL5入門學習指南，ISBN=957-442-337-9，旗標出版股份有限公司，2006.
